title: Is there a need for Alpha Client testers on a Mac
body:
I used to only use league on my PC. It died and now am exclusively a Mac client user (rip {{item:3070}} ).  Just wondering if there was a need for Mac users on a different build or boards. 

I volunteer for tribute. lol

replies.body: We have players on both mac and windows in the alpha. Sign up for the alpha and we'll let you know when we add more people!
Lol, Macs have their own problems, and that's where you guys come in to save each other, and sometimes even PC users.

I've been on the lcu since patch 0.5/0.6(don't know it anymore) and the new client is very good. a mac can finally handle the lol client without bugs. But i signed in when it was announced so you'll maybe lucky. But either way the lcu client will probably be available after the preseason.
just sign up for the alpha and when they need you, they will tell you ;D
